opportunities.title: MIT Solve Global Challenges 2026
opportunities.brief_overview: Tech-based solutions for global challenges. $1.5M+ funding, mentorship from MIT, and partnerships with leading organizations worldwide.

opportunities.title: Hult Prize 2026
opportunities.brief_overview: World's largest student competition for social good. Win $1M to change the world through social entrepreneurship at UN headquarters.

opportunities.title: XPRIZE Carbon Removal
opportunities.brief_overview: Largest prize in history. Remove CO2 from atmosphere or oceans. Funded by Elon Musk Foundation to combat climate change.

opportunities.title: XPRIZE Quantum Applications
opportunities.brief_overview: Generate quantum algorithms solving real-world problems. $5M prize for practical quantum computing applications.

opportunities.title: James Dyson Award 2026
opportunities.brief_overview: International design competition. Design something that solves a problem. £30,000 for global winner. Open to design and engineering students.

opportunities.title: Shell Eco-marathon 2026
opportunities.stipend_prize: Awards and recognition per energy class
opportunities.brief_overview: 40+ years of student engineering competition. Build super energy-efficient vehicles. Mileage challenge and autonomous driving competition.

opportunities.title: Microsoft Imagine Cup 2026
opportunities.stipend_prize: $100,000+ in prizes + Azure credits up to $5,000
opportunities.brief_overview: Premier global student tech competition. 20+ years empowering innovation. Build projects with Microsoft technologies solving world's challenges.

opportunities.title: iGEM Competition 2026
opportunities.stipend_prize: Awards and recognition. Registration fees apply per team.
opportunities.brief_overview: World's premiere synthetic biology competition. Design and build biological systems using standardized parts. Giant Jamboree in Paris.

opportunities.title: Breakthrough Junior Challenge 2026
opportunities.brief_overview: Create original video explaining complex scientific concept. $250K college scholarship for winner. $50K lab for school. Ages 13-18.

opportunities.title: MIT HackMIT 2026
opportunities.brief_overview: MIT's premier hackathon. Travel reimbursement available. Build innovative tech solutions with brilliant minds in 36 hours.

opportunities.title: Stanford TreeHacks 2026
opportunities.brief_overview: Stanford's premier hackathon with $600 travel support. Innovate with Stanford's brightest minds. Coding, hardware, and design tracks.

opportunities.title: UC Berkeley Cal Hacks 2026
opportunities.brief_overview: Berkeley's largest hackathon. Build innovative projects with top students. Multiple tracks and prizes. Bay Area location.

opportunities.title: Smart India Hackathon 2026
opportunities.organization: Ministry of Education, Government of India
opportunities.brief_overview: India's biggest hackathon. ₹1 lakh prize per problem. Solve real-world challenges for government ministries. Team of 6 students.

opportunities.title: Harvard HackHarvard 2026
opportunities.brief_overview: Harvard's premier hackathon with travel support. Build cutting-edge projects at Ivy League campus. Multiple prizes and tracks.

opportunities.title: ETHGlobal Hackathons 2026
opportunities.brief_overview: Multiple blockchain hackathons worldwide. $100K+ prizes per event. Build on Ethereum ecosystem with global Web3 community.

opportunities.title: Amazon ML Summer School 2026
opportunities.stipend_prize: Internship opportunities up to ₹1.5 Lakh/month + PPO up to 51 LPA
opportunities.brief_overview: FREE ML course by Amazon Scientists. Gateway to Amazon internships up to ₹1.5L/month. Pathways to 51 LPA PPO. 5th edition.

opportunities.title: Google Summer of Code 2026
opportunities.brief_overview: Contribute to 1,000+ open source organizations. $1,500-$6,600 stipend. Mentorship from experienced developers. Global remote program.

opportunities.title: Microsoft Research Data Science Summer School 2026
opportunities.brief_overview: Intensive program at MSR Redmond campus. Work with Microsoft researchers. Lectures, projects, and mentorship. All expenses covered.

opportunities.title: IIT Kanpur SURGE 2026
opportunities.stipend_prize: Stipend provided. Accommodation charges apply separately.
opportunities.brief_overview: 8-week undergraduate research at IIT Kanpur. Stipend provided. Experience academic atmosphere. Work with faculty mentor on research projects.

opportunities.title: IIITDM Jabalpur Summer School on Deep Learning 2026
opportunities.stipend_prize: Certificate of completion. Registration fee applies.
opportunities.brief_overview: 1-month online deep learning course. 35+ speakers from IITs/NITs. 2hrs theory + 2hrs practice daily. CNNs, RNNs, GANs, Transformers, LLMs.

opportunities.title: Oxford Machine Learning Summer School 2026
opportunities.stipend_prize: Financial aid available for underrepresented groups. Fees vary by track.
opportunities.brief_overview: World's largest advanced AI bootcamp. 5,000+ trained since 2020. 50% underrepresented groups. In-person at Oxford + Online option.

opportunities.title: Eastern European Machine Learning Summer School 2026
opportunities.stipend_prize: €80-400 fee. Travel grants available for need-based applicants.
opportunities.brief_overview: Intensive ML summer school. Travel grants for need-based applicants. Top researchers leading tutorials. Foundation models and trustworthy AI.

opportunities.title: S.N. Bose Scholars Program 2026
opportunities.location: USA (MIT, Stanford, UC Berkeley, Princeton, etc.)
opportunities.brief_overview: 50 Indian students intern at top US universities. $2K stipend, full airfare, insurance. Prestigious exchange program with MIT, Stanford, Berkeley.

opportunities.title: IUSSTF-Viterbi Program 2026
opportunities.organization: Indo-US Science and Technology Forum & USC Viterbi
opportunities.stipend_prize: 8-week stipend + round-trip airfare + health insurance + housing assistance
opportunities.brief_overview: Research at USC Viterbi School of Engineering. Fully funded. AI/ML, robotics, cybersecurity. Work with world-class faculty. All expenses covered.

opportunities.title: CALTECH SURF 2026
opportunities.brief_overview: Research at Caltech. $8,110 stipend. Access to NASA JPL and Keck Observatory. 300+ students from 40+ countries. Established 1979.

opportunities.title: CERN Summer Student Programme 2026
opportunities.stipend_prize: Monthly stipend + travel allowance + accommodation + meals + health insurance
opportunities.brief_overview: World's premier particle physics laboratory. 341 students from 100+ countries. Fully funded. Lectures by top researchers. Visit accelerators.

opportunities.title: NUS IRIS 2026
opportunities.stipend_prize: S$1,200/month + S$600 travel allowance + free on-campus housing + certificate
opportunities.brief_overview: Research at NUS Graduate School. S$1,200 stipend, free housing, S$600 travel. Close mentorship by professors. State-of-the-art labs.

opportunities.title: NUS SoC Summer Research Internship 2026
opportunities.organization: National University of Singapore - School of Computing
opportunities.brief_overview: Work with top CS faculty at NUS. SGD $5,000 stipend. AI/ML, computer vision, NLP, cybersecurity. Seminars and networking. Priority to underrepresented.

opportunities.title: France Excellence Charpak Lab Scholarship 2026
opportunities.stipend_prize: €700/month (maximum 2 months) + visa fee waiver + social security
opportunities.brief_overview: Short-term lab internships at French universities. €700/month, visa waiver, social security. Priority access to student residences.

opportunities.title: IEEE AP-S Student Design Contest 2026
opportunities.duration: Proposal Dec 2025, Final May 2026, Competition July 2026
opportunities.brief_overview: Focus on Automotive Antennas. $1,500 prize plus travel. Present at IEEE APS conference. Team competition with proposal and final submission.

opportunities.title: Spaceport America Cup 2026
opportunities.stipend_prize: Awards and recognition. Team registration fee required.
opportunities.brief_overview: World's largest intercollegiate rocket competition. Launch student-built rockets in New Mexico. Multiple categories and altitude targets.

opportunities.title: Kaggle Competitions
opportunities.brief_overview: World's largest ML competition platform. Multiple concurrent competitions. $10K-$1M prizes. Essential for building data science portfolio. Ranking system.

opportunities.title: TCS CodeVita Season 13
opportunities.stipend_prize: Cash prizes + interview opportunities at TCS
opportunities.brief_overview: TCS's global coding competition. Multi-round format. Winners get cash prizes and direct interview opportunities. For 2026-2028 graduates.

opportunities.title: Flipkart GRiD 7.0
opportunities.brief_overview: Flipkart's flagship hiring challenge. ₹1 lakh/month internship. Multi-stage competition. For 2026-2028 graduates. Finals in Bangalore.

opportunities.title: MIT Zero Robotics 2026
opportunities.stipend_prize: Awards and recognition. Finals at MIT.
opportunities.brief_overview: Program satellites aboard International Space Station. Virtual competition with finals at MIT. Code runs in space. High school and college levels.

opportunities.title: NeurIPS Competition Track 2026
opportunities.brief_overview: ML research challenges at world's top AI conference. Multiple competitions annually. Winners present at NeurIPS. Highly prestigious.

opportunities.title: Google Solution Challenge 2026
opportunities.brief_overview: Build solutions for UN SDGs using Google technologies. $3K for top 10, $1K for next 100. University students through GDSC chapters worldwide.
